record.title: DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE APPROPRIATIONS ACT, 2008--CONFERENCE REPORT--Continued
record.narrative:
DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE APPROPRIATIONS ACT, 2008--CONFERENCE REPORT--Continued -- (Senate - November 08, 2007)

[Page: S14182]
record.chair: The question is on agreeing to the conference report.
The conference report was agreed to.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I move to reconsider the vote, and I move to lay that motion on the table.

record.narrative: The motion to lay on the table was agreed to.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, there will be no more rollcall votes this week. The first vote next week will be at 10:10 Tuesday morning.
I note the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.
The legislative clerk proceeded to call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
The Senate will be in order. Members will take their conversations off the floor.
